desc: At Mantra Medallions, create reminders that you, your family, and friends can use to cultivate love, healing and peace. Use your Mantra Medallion to set your intention for the day, for your yoga or meditation practice, or to keep as a prompt to return to the present moment.

layout.text:
At Mantra Medallions, we create reminders that you, your family, and friends can use to cultivate love, healing and peace.
Use your Mantra Medallion to set your intention for the day, for your yoga or meditation practice, or to keep as a prompt to return to the present moment.
